name: Jesus is back... and he is fucking angry - CD Digipack
description:
No shipping costs if you show up in Ulm or at our next show. Cash works too in this case.

Our first record. 6 songs of blasting Thrash Metal and one lovely intro.

Tracklist:
1   Let the Mayhem Begin (1:32)
2   Jesus is Back.... (5:08)
3   Murder of Souls (5:22)
4   Ghostrider (4:26)
5   Question of Life (5:15)
6   Kingdom of the Damned (5:06)
7   The Devil in Me (8:28)

All songs on this lovely sound carrier written and performed by the Raw Ensemble
Recorded by Oak at City Sound Ulm
Mixed by Raw Ensemble & Oak
Mastered by Role at Tonmeisterei Oldenburg

Listen to songs and contact us via
www.myspace/rawensemble
www.facebook.com/pages/Raw-Ensemble/176527209067519
Find videos at www.youtube.com/user/RawEnsemble

Horns up to all of our friends, first supporters and bands we have and have not yet played with.

Thanks for listening. The Raw Ensemble. Ulm 2011.

Demoreview Metal Hammer, Sep. 2011
RAW ENSEMBLE
Power Thrash!
Das die Achziger wieder schwer en vogue sind, ist spätestens seit Combos wie Steelwing, Skull Fist oder Enforcer kein Geheimnis mehr. Das fünfköpfige Raw Ensemble aus Ulm mischt ebenfalls im Reigen der Achziger- Renaissance mit, allerdings auf der brachialen Ebene: Speed-, Power- und US Underground-Metal sowie sehr, sehr viel Bay Area Thrash heißen hier die Zutaten, aus denen die Baden-Württemberger ihre sechs heißen, hochernergetischen Eisen mit einer Gesamtlaufzeit von 35:19 Min. gießen. Referenzliebhaber nehmen diese hier: Exodus, Lääz Rockit, Testament und (dezent) Machine Head.
Andreas Schöwe

name: Jesus is back... and he is fucking angry - CD Digipack (stupid die hard fan edition)
description:
Stupid die hard fan edition with destroyed cover.
Torture tools: screwdriver, knife, nails, pen, rough stone, coffee, beer, The Raw Ensemble,..... and beer. We might even puke on it ;-)

No shipping costs within Germany

Our first record. 6 songs of blasting Thrash Metal and one lovely intro.

name: Jesus is back... and he is fucking angry - MP3
description:
7 files high quality VBR (192-320 kbps).

File sizes vary from 2.53 to 17.5 MB
Total file size 69.1 MB

MP3s can be send to your Paypal e-mail adresse or can be transfered via Dropbox. Contact us if you have any questions.
